comments.body: not sure mean actually should work on PeriodIndex/Array
how come?  the meaning is unambiguous

I guess these have to be uniform periods so mean is just another period, though I think this could easily be a non-sensical return values, e.g. what is the mean of 

```
In [2]: pd.date_range('2012', freq='M', periods=4)                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
Out[2]: DatetimeIndex(['2012-01-31', '2012-02-29', '2012-03-31', '2012-04-30'], dtype='datetime64[ns]', freq='M')

```

>  the meaning is unambiguous

Can you explain that more? Maybe from an implementation point (viewing it as integers) it is clear what to do, but semantically for periods, I certainly don't find this obvious.

diffHunk:
